languages.text: "Когда имеешь дело с ашмагами-друкари, представляй наихудший исход. А затем умножай самые мерзкие свои подозрения в десять... нет, в тридцать раз".
"When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."
languages.original_text: "Когда имеешь дело с ашмагами-друкари, представляй наихудший исход. А затем умножай самые мерзкие свои подозрения в десять... нет, в тридцать раз".

traits.locale_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario tenfold... or better yet, thirtyfold."
"When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario tenfold... or better yet, thirtyfold."
"When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario tenfold... or better yet, thirtyfold."
"When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."
"When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

languages.text: « Quand on affronte des ashmags drukharis, il faut s'attendre au pire... mais d'abord, il faut multiplier ce pire par dix... voire trente. »
languages.original_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

traits.locale_text: « Quand on affronte des ashmags drukhari, il faut s'attendre au pire... mais d'abord, il faut multiplier ce pire par dix, voire trente. »

languages.text: “当你和黑暗灵族那帮坏种打交道时，你得准备好面对最糟糕的情况。而且，你最好把最糟糕的情形加重十倍……或者更多点，加重三十倍。”
languages.original_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

traits.locale_text: “当你和黑暗灵族那帮坏家伙打交道时，你得准备好面对最糟糕的情况。而且，你最好把最糟糕的情形加重十倍……或者更多点，加重三十倍。”

languages.text: "Wenn man es mit Drukhari-Ashmags zu tun hat, muss man immer mit dem schlimmsten vorstellbaren Szenario rechnen. Doch zuvor muss man dieses katastrophal schlimme Szenario mit zehn multiplizieren ... oder besser noch mit dreißig."
languages.original_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man es mit Drukhari-Ashmags zu tun hat, muss man immer mit dem schlimmsten vorstellbaren Szenario rechnen. Doch zuvor muss man dieses katastrophal schlimme Szenario mit zehn multiplizieren ... oder besser noch mit dreißig."

languages.text: «Cuando te enfrentas a ashmags Drukhari te preparas para la peor situación. Pero antes, te imaginas esa horrible situación multiplicada por diez... o treinta».
languages.original_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando te enfrentas a ashmags Drukhari te preparas para la peor situación. Pero antes, te imaginas esa horrible situación diez veces o incluso treinta veces peor».

languages.text: 「あんたがデュカーリのクズに立ち向かう時には、絶対的に最悪のシナリオを立てるよね。だけどその前に、最悪のシナリオを10倍…なんなら、30倍もっと悪いものにしちまうんだ」
languages.original_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたがデュカーリのクズに立ち向かう時には、絶対的に最悪のシナリオを立てるよね。だけどその前に、最悪のシナリオを10倍…なんなら、30倍もっと悪いものにしちまうんだ」

languages.text: "Drukhari külboğazların eline düştüysen en kötüsüne hazırlanacaksın. Hatta on misline... Yok, otuz misline."
languages.original_text: "When you're up against Drukhari ashmags, you plan for the absolute worst scenario. But before you do, you multiply that abysmally bad scenario by ten... or better yet, by thirty."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari külboğazların eline düştüysen en kötüsüne hazırlanacaksın. Hatta on misline... Yok, otuz misline."
